title: Managing aggressive behaviour
creator_credit: Tim Abbott, Helen Edwards, Tony Shaddock and New England Educational Diagnostic Centre
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Managing difficult behaviours”.
Module 3.1. Designed to assist the intellectual disability residential care worker to understand why aggressive behaviour occurs, learn how to “get in first” to avoid aggressive outbursts and how to deal systematically with particular forms of aggressive behaviour that have become a regular behaviour pattern. Accompanied by 48p. in-service training manual.
